general.title: Error
general.subtitle: Something went wrong
general.description: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The request could not be understood by the server.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You need to be authenticated to access this resource.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Not Found
404.message: The requested resource was not found.

405.title: Method Not Allowed
405.message: The HTTP method is not allowed for this resource.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.message: The request timed out. Please try again.

409.title: Conflict
409.message: The request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

422.title: Unprocessable Entity
422.message: The request was well-formed but contains invalid parameters.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You've made too many requests. Please wait before trying again.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.

502.title: Bad Gateway
502.message: The server received an invalid response from an upstream server.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

504.title: Gateway Timeout
504.message: The server took too long to respond. Please try again.

network.offline: You are offline. Please check your internet connection.

validation.email: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phone: Please enter a valid phone number

password.requirements: Password must contain at least 8 characters, including letters, numbers, and symbols

auth.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
auth.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
auth.unauthorized: You are not authorized to perform this action.
auth.accountLocked: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.
auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
